devdoc.details: SLARegistry is a contract for handling creation of service level agreements and keeping track of the created agreements

PeriodInitialized(uint8,uint256,uint256,.details: event to log a new period initialized

params.apy: 3. annual percentage yield offered for a year long SLA
params.periodType: 1. period type i.e. Hourly, Daily, Weekly, BiWeekly, Monthly, Yearly
params.yearlyPeriods: 4. amount of periods of the corresponding periods per year to calculate real APY

addPeriodsToPeriodType(uint8,uint256[],u.details: function to add new periods to certain period type

params._periodEnds: 3. array of uint256 of the period starts to add
params._periodStarts: 2. array of uint256 of the period starts to add
params._periodType: 1. period type i.e. Hourly, Daily, Weekly, BiWeekly, Monthly, Yearly

getPeriodStartAndEnd(uint8,uint256).details: public function to get the start and end of a period

params._periodId: 2. period id to get start and end
params._periodType: 1. period type i.e. Hourly, Daily, Weekly, BiWeekly, Monthly, Yearly

initializePeriod(uint8,uint256[],uint256.details: public function for creating canonical service level agreements

params._periodEnds: 3. array of the ends of the period
params._periodStarts: 2. array of the starts of the period
params._periodType: 1. period type i.e. Hourly, Daily, Weekly, BiWeekly, Monthly, Yearly
params._yearlyPeriods: 5. amount of periods of the corresponding periods per year to calculate real APY

isValidPeriod(uint8,uint256).details: public function to check if a period id is valid i.e. it belongs to the added id array

params._periodId: 2. period id to get start and end
params._periodType: 1. period type i.e. Hourly, Daily, Weekly, BiWeekly, Monthly, Yearly

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

periodIsFinished(uint8,uint256).details: public function to check if a period has finished

params._periodId: 2. period id to get start and end
params._periodType: 1. period type i.e. Hourly, Daily, Weekly, BiWeekly, Monthly, Yearly

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SLARegistry
